title: Project-Based Learning Course for Language Education Design for Pre-Service Adult Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: A smartphone-centric limited-technology environment emphasizing competencies in designing practical language education

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a language education design framework reflecting real elementary classroom environments.
Learners can produce project outcomes that incorporate industry-linked curriculum requirements and lifelong learning competencies.
Learners demonstrate the ability to design effective language learning activities in limited technological environments (smartphones).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
